reviewText: This book is completely worth the price, and worth the hardcover to take care of it. The main chapters of the book are independent, so you can read them in any order. The way it explains the different learning approaches is beautiful because:  1)it explains them nicely 2)it gives examples and 3)it presents pseudocode summaries of the algorithms. As a software developer, what else could I possibly ask for?
title: Machine Learning
